== Magnus ==
I am a system administrator in the Raleigh, North Carolina (USA) area.  I use Ubuntu at home and at work, primarily on workstations but also to a more limited extent on servers. I have also been getting more involved with <nowiki>[[http://nexenta.org|Nexenta]]</nowiki>.

I have established the <nowiki>[[NorthCarolinaTeam|North Carolina LoCo]]</nowiki> and used to operate the #ubuntu-northcarolina channel on Freenode.

<nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~viridari/|My launchpad page]]</nowiki>.

I also have <nowiki>[[http://viridari.wordpress.com|a blog]]</nowiki>.
